string.value: You hear that Todd can teach you how to hunt...

Todd asks you to attack and defeat a #bJr. Sentinel#k, then talk to #p2002#.

Jr. Sentinel #b#a10181##k
#t4000142# #b#c4000142#/1#k
You defeated the monster, just as Todd instructed.

A new traveler, eh? Want to learn how to hunt? The Jr. Sentinels you see here are normally too powerful for you to handle, but Grendel the Really Old, the head of all magicians, sealed up their power. So take one down, pick up what it drops, and go see #b#p2002##k, who should be up around here somewhere.

Look at your minimap (#bM#k), located at the top left corner of the screen. You should see something green blinking on the northeast side of the map. That's #b#p2002##k. You'll run into a Jr. Sentinel on your way to meet #b#p2002##k. Defeat it, pick up 1 #t4000142#, then talk to #p2002#.
Oh, you know how to hunt already? Well, you can still test your abilities!
Are you the one #p2004# is training? He mentioned you... Let's see if you've trained correctly.

Someday, long after you leave this place, you'll be powerful enough to take on real Jr. Sentinels. Oh, and when you level up, press #bS#k to check your #bAbility Points.#k\n\nTo move on to the next map, either press the #bup arrow#k in front of the portal to the right or just talk to me again.
What? Haven't you gone to #b#p2002##k yet? You need to defeat #1 Sentinel#k and take #b1 #t4000142##k with you!
Huh? You're not carrying a #b#t4000142##k. After you've defeated a Jr. Sentinel, it'll drop a #t4000142#. Then press #rZ#k to pick up the item.
Hmm, you should have seen a small Jr. Sentinel at the bottom of the map. Press #rCtrl#k to attack it. Pick up the item it drops once you defeat it, then come talk to me.
